column1: S0126.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0126.DECK.  126. SURVEY NUMBER
S0126.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S0126.Q1. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  1. 18-19 YEARS 2. 20-24 3. 25-29 4. 30-34 5. 35 YEARS AND OVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q2. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. GRADE OR GRAMMAR SCHOOL 2. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 3. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 4. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 5. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 3 AND 4 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

S0126.Q3. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED, OR WIDOWED? F. IF MARRIED:  Q.4. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY?  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 5. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q5. WHERE DID YOU LIVE MOST OF THE TIME BEFORE YOU WERE 16 YEARS OLD?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q6. BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY, HOW MANY DIFFERENT STATES OF THE UNITED STATES HAD YOU BEEN IN TO LIVE OR WORK?  1. ONE STATE 2. TWO STATES 3. THREE STATES 4. FOUR STATES 5. FIVE OR MORE STATES 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q7. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY? E. IF YOU HAVE SERVED PREVIOUSLY IN THE ARMY, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE A NATIONAL GUARDSMAN, GIVE THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT ENTERED THE ARMY.  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q8. HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WAR  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q9. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED COMMAND 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 00. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q10. IF YOU HAD A CHOICE, WHICH ONE OF THESE BRANCHES OF THE ARMY WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE IN?  1. CHOOSES SAME BRANCH: INFANTRY 2. CHOOSES SAME BRANCH: OTHER FIELD FORCES 3. CHOOSES SAME BRANCH: SERVICES OF SUPPLY 4. CHOOSES SAME BRANCH: AIR CORPS 5. CHOOSES DIFFERENT BRANCH: FIELD FORCES, CHOOSES AIR CORPS 6. CHOOSES DIFFERENT BRANCH: FIELD FORCES CHOOSES SERVICES OF SUPPLY 7. CHOOSES DIFFERENT BRANCH: SERVICES OF SUPPLY CHOOSES AIR CORPS 8. OTHER COMBINATIONS 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q11. HOW MANY BROTHERS AND SISTERS OLDER THAN YOU DO YOU HAVE?  1. ONE 2. TWO 3. THREE OR MORE 4. NONE 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q12. HOW MANY BROTHERS AND SISTERS YOUNGER THAN YOU DO YOU HAVE?  1. ONE 2. TWO 3. THREE OR MORE 4. NONE 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q13. HOW MANY JOBS DID YOU HAVE IN THE LAST TWO YEARS BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. ONE 2. TWO 3. THREE 4. FOUR 5. FIVE 6. SIX OR MORE 7. NONE 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q14. BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY HAD YOU EVER BEEN FIRED OR ASKED TO RESIGN FROM A JOB?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I NEVER HAD A JOB 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q15. BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY ABOUT HOW OFTEN DID YOU GO TO CHURCH?  1. ONCE A WEEK, OR MORE 2. TWO OR THREE TIMES A MONTH 3. ABOUT ONCE A MONTH 4. SEVERAL TIMES A YEAR 5. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q16. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARMY?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q17. DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE GOOD IN THE ARMY?  1. I FEEL VERY SURE I CAN MAKE GOOD 2. I THINK I CAN MAKE GOOD, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. I DON'T THINK I CAN MAKE GOOD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q18. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRITS?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q19. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSET?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q20. DO YOU OFTEN SAY THINGS THAT YOU LATER WISH YOU HADN'T SAID?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q21. DO YOU WORRY MUCH ABOUT THINGS THAT MIGHT HAPPEN TO YOU?  1. WORRY A GREAT DEAL 2. WORRY QUITE A BIT 3. DON'T WORRY VERY MUCH 4. DON'T WORRY AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q22. DO YOU THINK YOU HAVE AS MUCH OF A PERSONAL STAKE IN THIS WAR AS ANYBODY ELSE?  1. YES 2. I THINK SO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q23. IN YOUR OPINION IS THE UNITED STATES FIGHTING FOR THINGS THAT YOU FEEL ARE WORTH FIGHTING FOR?  1. YES 2. I THINK SO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q24. DO YOU THINK IT WOULD MAKE MUCH DIFFERENCE TO YOU PERSONALLY IF WE DID NOT WIN THIS WAR?  1. IT WOULD MAKE A GREAT DEAL OF DIFFERENCE TO ME 2. IT WOULD MAKE QUITE A BIT OF DIFFERENCE TO ME 3. IT WOULD NOT MAKE SO MUCH DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. IT WOULD NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q25. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTING?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q26. DO YOU THINK THE THINGS WE ARE FIGHTING FOR ARE WORTH RISKING YOUR LIFE FOR?  1. YES 2. I THINK SO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q27. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE IN?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT THAT WILL STAY IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q28. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JOB?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q29. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, AND YOU YOURSELF HAD TO DECIDE, WOULD YOU CHOOSE TO BE A SOLDIER OR A CIVILIAN?  1. WOULD CHOOSE TO BE A SOLDIER 2. WOULD CHOOSE TO BE A CIVILIAN 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q30. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE GERMANS AFTER THE WAR?  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY GERMAN 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE GERMAN NATION 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q31. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE JAPANESE AFTER THE WAR?  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY JAPANESE 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY JAPANESE PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE JAPANESE NATION 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q32A. BASKETBALL?  1. A LOT 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q32B. BASEBALL?  1. A LOT 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q32C. FISHING OR HUNTING?  1. A LOT 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q32D. GOLF?  1. A LOT 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q32E. FOOTBALL?  1. A LOT 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q32F. TENNIS?  1. A LOT 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.V32G. PARTICIPATION IN SPORTS: X. SPORTS ARE CLASSIFIED AS "BLOOD SPORTS" (B) OR "OTHER SPORTS" (X). "BLOOD SPORTS" INCLUDE: (FOOTBALL, BOXING, BASKETBALL, WRESTLING, HOCKEY, LACROSSE, SOCCER AND ANY OTHER VIGOROUS SPORT INVOLVING BODY CONTACT. "OTHER SPORTS" INCLUDE: (GOLF, TENNIS, HUNTING AND FISHING, TRACK, SWIMMING, VOLLEY BALL AND BASEBALL. COUNT ONLY THE SPORTS WHICH HAVE BEEN CHECKED "A LOT" IN QUESTIONS 32A-32F.  1. ONE "B" SPORT 2. ONE "B" SPORT AND ONE "X" SPORT 3. ONE "B" SPORT AND TWO OR MORE "X" SPORTS 4. TWO OR MORE "B" SPORTS AND ONE "X" SPORT 5. TWO OR MORE "B" SPORTS AND TWO OR MORE "X" SPORTS 6. TWO OR MORE "B" SPORTS AND NO "X" SPORTS 7. NO "B" SPORT AND ONE "X" SPORT 8. NO "B" SPORT AND TWO OR MORE "X" SPORTS 9. NO SPORTS (LITTLE AND NOT AT ALL IN COMBINATION QUESTIONS 32A-32F) 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q33. DID PEOPLE SEEM TO THINK YOU HAD A HOT TEMPER WHEN YOU WERE A KID?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q34. HOW OFTEN DID YOU GET INTO FIGHTS WHEN YOU WERE A KID?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q35. WERE YOU A GOOD FIGHTER AS A KID?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q36. HOW DID YOU FEEL ABOUT FIGHTING AS A KID?  1. REALLY LIKED FIGHTING 2. DIDN'T PARTICULARLY LIKE OR DISLIKE IT 3. DIDN'T LIKE FIGHTING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER P. THE NEXT FEW QUESTIONS ABOUT HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENT ARE VERY IMPORTANT TO THE ARMY. ANSWER EACH ONE CAREFULLY EVEN THOUGH SOME OF THEM MAY SOUND STRANGE OR EVEN USELESS TO YOU. STATISTICS ARE NEEDED BY MEDICAL EXAMINERS FOR IMPROVING TREATMENT OF MEN WHO NEED HELP IN MEETING THE PROBLEMS OF ARMY LIFE AND IN CLASSIFICATION OF MEN AT INDUCTION STATIONS. WHEN THE ANSWERS OF ALL KINDS OF SOLDIERS ARE KNOWN, IT MAY BE POSSIBLE TO GIVE MORE EFFECTIVE HELP TO THOSE SOLDIERS WHO HAVE SPECIAL PROBLEMS.
S0126.Q37. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT MEDICAL ATTENTION IN THE ARMY?  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS FAIRLY GOOD 3. IT IS VERY POOR 4. IT IS POOR 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q38. DO YOU HAVE ANY PARTICULAR PHYSICAL OR HEALTH PROBLEM?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q39. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN BOTHERED BY SHORTNESS OF BREATH WHEN YOU WERE NOT EXERCISING OR WORKING HARD?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q40. ARE YOU EVER TROUBLED BY YOUR HANDS SWEATING SO THAT THEY FEEL DAMP AND CLAMMY?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q41. HOW OFTEN ARE YOU BOTHERED BY HAVING AN UPSET STOMACH?  1. NEARLY ALL THE TIME 2. PRETTY OFTEN 3. NOT VERY OFTEN 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q42. ARE YOU EVER BOTHERED BY HAVING NIGHTMARES (DREAMS THAT FRIGHTEN OR UPSET YOU VERY MUCH)*  1. YES, MANY TIMES 2. YES, A FEW TIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q43. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN TROUBLED BY "COLD SWEATS"*  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, A FEW TIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q44. HAVE YOU EVER HAD ANY FAINTING SPELLS?  1. YES, SEVERAL TIMES 2. YES, A FEW TIMES 3. NEVER HAD ANY 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q45. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN BOTHERED BY YOUR HEART BEATING HARD?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, A FEW TIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q46. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN BOTHERED BY PRESSURE OR PAINS IN THE HEAD?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q47. HAVE YOU EVER HAD SPELLS OF DIZZINESS?  1. YES, MANY TIMES 2. YES, A FEW TIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q48. DO YOU OFTEN HAVE TROUBLE IN GETTING TO SLEEP OR STAYING ASLEEP?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q49. DO YOUR HANDS EVER TREMBLE ENOUGH TO BOTHER YOU?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q50. DO YOU EVER BITE YOUR FINGERNAILS NOW?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q51. DID YOU BITE YOUR FINGERNAILS WHEN YOU WERE A CHILD?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q52. ABOUT HOW OLD WERE YOU WHEN YOU STOPPED BITING YOUR FINGERNAILS?  1. AGE MENTIONED 2. I STILL BITE MY FINGERNAILS 3. DON'T KNOW HOW OLD I WAS 4. NEVER DID BITE MY FINGERNAILS 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q53. WHEN YOU WERE GROWING UP, DID YOU HAVE TROUBLE WITH STUTTERING OR STAMMERING IN YOUR SPEECH?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q54. WHAT KIND OF GRADES DID YOU USUALLY GET WHEN YOU WERE IN SCHOOL?  1. VERY HIGH GRADES 2. HIGH GRADES 3. MEDIUM GRADES 4. LOW GRADES 5. VERY LOW GRADES 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q55. AS A CHILD HOW DID YOU FEEL ABOUT GOING TO SCHOOL?  1. REALLY WANTED VERY MUCH TO GO 2. DIDN'T CARE VERY MUCH WHETHER I WENT TO SCHOOL OR NOT 3. DID NOT AT ALL WANT TO GO 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0126.Q56. WHEN YOU WERE A KID, HOW OFTEN WOULD YOU SAY YOU PLAYED HOOKY FROM SCHOOL (STAYED AWAY AS MUCH AS A DAY)*  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SEVERAL TIMES 3. ONLY ONCE OR TWICE IN ALL THE TIME I WAS IN SCHOOL 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q57. BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY DID YOU USUALLY GO AROUND WITH A BUNCH OF OTHERS OR BY YOURSELF?  1. I USUALLY WENT AROUND BY MYSELF 2. I USUALLY WENT AROUND WITH JUST ONE OR TWO OTHERS 3. I USUALLY WENT AROUND WITH A BUNCH OF OTHERS 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q58. ON THE WHOLE, BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY DID YOU USUALLY LIKE TO BE BY YOURSELF OR TO BE WITH OTHER PEOPLE?  1. USUALLY LIKED BETTER TO BE BY MYSELF 2. USUALLY LIKED BETTER TO BE WITH OTHER PEOPLE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q59. HOW WOULD YOU SAY THE PEOPLE YOU KNOW FEEL ABOUT YOU?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM LIKE ME 2. MOST OF THEM LIKE ME 3. A FEW OF THEM LIKE ME 4. ALMOST NONE OF THEM LIKE ME 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q60. DO YOU EVER GET SO BLUE AND DISCOURAGED THAT YOU WONDER WHETHER ANYTHING IS WORTHWHILE?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. PRETTY OFTEN 3. NOT SO OFTEN 4. HARDLY EVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q61. DO YOU EVER FEEL THAT YOU GET MORE THAN YOUR SHARE OF BAD LUCK?  1. VERY OFTEN FEEL THAT WAY 2. SOMETIMES FEEL THAT WAY 3. ALMOST NEVER FEEL THAT WAY 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q62. WHEN YOU GET A VERY IMPORTANT JOB TO DO, DO YOU WORRY ABOUT WHETHER YOU WILL DO ALL RIGHT OR NOT?  1. I WORRY A LOT 2. I WORRY A LITTLE 3. I DON'T WORRY AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q63. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU BEEN WORRIED ABOUT YOUR FAMILY BACK HOME?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q64. DO YOU EVER SERIOUSLY WORRY ABOUT WHETHER OR NOT THERE WILL BE A REAL DEPRESSION AFTER THIS WAR?  1. WORRY ABOUT IT VERY OFTEN 2. WORRY ABOUT IT SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER WORRY ABOUT IT 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q65. DO YOU EVER WORRY ABOUT WHETHER YOU WILL BE INJURED IN COMBAT BEFORE THE WAR IS OVER?  1. WORRY A GREAT DEAL ABOUT IT 2. WORRY ABOUT IT FAIRLY OFTEN 3. HARDLY EVER WORRY ABOUT IT 4. NEVER WORRY ABOUT IT 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q66. HOW OFTEN DO PEOPLE HURT YOUR FEELINGS?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q67. HOW OFTEN DOES IT MAKE YOU SORE TO HAVE PEOPLE TELL YOU WHAT TO DO?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER CARD 2
S0126.CARD.  2. CARD TWO
S0126.DECK.  126. SURVEY NUMBER
S0126.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0126.Q68. HOW MUCH DOES IT BOTHER YOU WHEN YOU ARE ORDERED TO DO SOMETHING YOU DON'T SEE A GOOD REASON FOR DOING?  1. BOTHERS ME A GREAT DEAL 2. BOTHERS ME SOME 3. BOTHERS ME VERY LITTLE 4. DOESN'T BOTHER ME AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q69. HOW OFTEN DO PEOPLE GET ON YOUR NERVES SO THAT YOU WANT TO DO JUST THE OPPOSITE OF WHAT THEY WANT YOU TO DO?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q70. DO YOU EVER GO OUT OF YOUR WAY TO MAKE THINGS TOUGH OR UNPLEASANT FOR SOMEBODY YOU DON'T LIKE?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q71. DO YOU EVER FEEL LIKE SMASHING THINGS FOR NO SPECIAL REASON?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q72. DO YOU FIND THAT YOU OFTEN HAVE TO TELL PEOPLE TO MIND THEIR OWN BUSINESS?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q73. DO YOU EVER FEEL THAT PEOPLE IN THE ARMY CRITICIZE YOU TOO MUCH WITHOUT ANY GOOD REASON?  1. I FEEL THAT WAY NEARLY ALL OF THE TIME 2. I FEEL THAT WAY FAIRLY OFTEN 3. I FEEL THAT WAY ONLY ONCE IN A WHILE 4. I ALMOST NEVER FEEL THAT WAY 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q74A. BEING ON HIGH PLACES?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q74B. BEING SHUT UP IN A ROOM OR CLOSET?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q74C. FALLING?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q74D. SNAKES?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q74E. BEING CALLED ON TO RECITE IN CLASS?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.V74F. TOTAL NUMBER CHECKED "VERY MUCH" IN Q.74:  1. 1-2 2. 3-4 3. 5-6 4. 7-8 5. 9-10 6. 11-12 7. 13 AND OVER 8. NONE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0126.V74G. TOTAL NUMBER OF "NO ANSWERS" IN Q.74:  1. 1-2 2. 3-4 3. 5-9 4. 10-14 5. 15-19 6. NONE

S0126.Q75. DID YOUR PARENTS ALWAYS LIVE TOGETHER UP TO THE TIME YOU WERE 16 YEARS OLD? IF "NO", GIVE THE REASON.  1. YES 2. NO, SEPARATION 3. NO, DEATH OF FATHER 4. NO, DEATH OF MOTHER 5. NO, DIVORCE 6. NO, DEATH BOTH PARENTS 7. NO, SOME OTHER REASON 8. NO, NO ANSWER 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q76. DO YOU THINK THAT YOUR PARENTS (OR THE PEOPLE WHO BROUGHT YOU UP) WERE STRICTER THAN OTHER PARENTS OR NOT AS STRICT AS OTHER PARENTS?  1. STRICTER THAN OTHER PARENTS 2. ABOUT AS STRICT AS OTHER PARENTS 3. NOT AS STRICT AS OTHER PARENTS 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q77. WHEN YOU WERE GROWING UP, ABOUT HOW OFTEN WERE YOU PUNISHED BY YOUR PARENTS (OR THE PEOPLE WHO BROUGHT YOU UP)*  1. TOO OFTEN 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT NUMBER OF TIMES 3. NOT OFTEN ENOUGH 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q78. WHEN YOUR PARENTS (OR THE PEOPLE WHO BROUGHT YOU UP) PUNISHED YOU, DID YOU USUALLY DESERVE IT OR NOT?  1. ALWAYS DESERVED IT 2. DESERVED IT MOST OF THE TIME 3. DESERVED IT ABOUT HALF OF THE TIME 4. OFTEN DID NOT DESERVE IT 5. HARDLY EVER DESERVED IT 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q79. WHEN YOU HAD ACTUALLY DONE SOMETHING WRONG AND WERE PUNISHED FOR IT, DID YOU USUALLY GET AN EASIER OR A HARDER PUNISHMENT THAN OTHER KIDS YOU KNOW?  1. HARDER THAN OTHERS 2. ABOUT THE SAME AS OTHERS 3. EASIER THAN OTHERS 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q80A. WHEN YOU WERE GROWING UP, WHO WOULD YOU SAY WAS YOUR FATHER'S FAVORITE CHILD IN YOUR FAMILY?  1. AN OLDER BROTHER OR SISTER WAS THE FAVORITE 2. A YOUNGER BROTHER OR SISTER WAS THE FAVORITE 3. I THINK I WAS THE FAVORITE 4. THERE WERE NO FAVORITES 5. I WAS THE ONLY CHILD IN MY FAMILY 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q80B. WHO WAS YOUR MOTHER'S FAVORITE CHILD?  1. AN OLDER BROTHER OR SISTER WAS THE FAVORITE 2. A YOUNGER BROTHER OR SISTER WAS THE FAVORITE 3. I THINK I WAS THE FAVORITE 4. THERE WERE NO FAVORITES 5. I WAS THE ONLY CHILD IN MY FAMILY 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q81. HOW OLD WERE YOU WHEN YOU STARTED LIVING AWAY FROM YOUR PARENTS OR THE FAMILY THAT BROUGHT YOU UP?  1. LESS THAN 15 YEARS OLD 2. 15 TO 17 YEARS 3. 18 TO 21 YEARS 4. 22 TO 26 YEARS 5. OVER 26 YEARS OLD 6. NEVER LIVED AWAY BEFORE I CAME INTO THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q82. BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY, WHAT WAS THE LONGEST YOU HAD EVER BEEN AWAY AT ANY ONE TIME FROM YOUR PARENTS OR THE FAMILY THAT BROUGHT YOU UP? (IF YOU LEFT HOME TO GET MARRIED, COUNT THE TIME YOU WERE AWAY AFTER YOU WERE MARRIED.)  1. A YEAR OR MORE 2. ONE MONTH TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 WEEK, BUT LESS THAN A MONTH 4. ONLY A FEW DAYS 5. LESS THAN 48 HOURS 6. NEVER AWAY AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q83. BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY, WHAT WAS THE LONGEST YOU HAD EVER BEEN AWAY FROM YOUR FAMILY OR ANYBODY RELATED TO YOU? (BY "FAMILY" IS MEANT YOUR PARENTS, BROTHERS AND SISTERS, OR PEOPLE WHO BROUGHT YOU UP.)  1. A YEAR OR MORE 2. ONE MONTH TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 WEEK, BUT LESS THAN A MONTH 4. ONLY A FEW DAYS 5. LESS THAN 48 HOURS 6. NEVER AWAY AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q84. HOW OLD WERE YOU WHEN YOU FIRST STARTED GOING AROUND BY YOURSELF ON DATES WITH GIRLS (NOT ON DOUBLE-DATES OR IN LARGE GROUPS)*  1. LESS THAN 15 YEARS OLD 2. 15-16 YEARS 3. 17-18 YEARS 4. 19-20 YEARS 5. 21-22 YEARS 6. OVER 22 YEARS 7. NEVER WENT WITH GIRLS ON DATES 8. NEVER WENT WITH GIRLS EXCEPT ON DOUBLE-DATES OR IN A GROUP OF OTHERS 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q85. DID YOU USUALLY HAVE DATES WITH GIRLS MORE OFTEN OR LESS OFTEN THAN MOST OTHER FELLOWS OF ABOUT YOUR OWN AGE THAT YOU KNEW?  1. MORE OFTEN THAN MOST OTHER FELLOWS I KNEW 2. ABOUT THE SAME AS MOST OTHER FELLOWS I KNEW 3. NOT AS OFTEN AS MOST OTHER FELLOWS I KNEW 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q86. HOW OLD WERE YOU WHEN YOU FIRST STARTED GOING STEADY WITH ONE GIRL?  1. LESS THAN 18 YEARS OLD 2. 18-20 YEARS 3. 21-23 YEARS 4. 24-26 YEARS 5. OVER 26 YEARS 6. NEVER WENT STEADY WITH ANY ONE GIRL 0. NO ANSWER

S0126.Q87. WHEN YOU WERE GROWING UP, DID YOU USUALLY HAVE A BETTER TIME WITH PEOPLE YOUNGER THAN YOURSELF OR OLDER THAN YOURSELF?  1. HAD A BETTER TIME WITH THOSE OLDER THAN MYSELF 2. HAD A BETTER TIME WITH THOSE OF THE SAME AGE AS MYSELF 3. HAD A BETTER TIME WITH THOSE YOUNGER THAN MYSELF 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q88. ARE YOU EVER TROUBLED BY SICK HEADACHES?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0126.Q89. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, WERE YOU A HEALTHY CHILD OR A RATHER SICKLY ONE?  1. I WAS VERY HEALTHY AS A CHILD 2. I WAS FAIRLY HEALTHY AS A CHILD 3. I WAS RATHER SICKLY AS A CHILD 4. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0126.Q90A. DID YOU EVER HAVE ANY TROUBLE WITH BED-WETTING?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
